text: Answer: 4 Solution: Q0Q1Q2 — 000 — 110 — 011 — 101 — 000 J1= Q2" K1=1andJ2=Q1,K2=1 flip flop O and 1 are positive edge triggered flip flop and lip flop 2 is negative edge triggered flip flop. So state of flip flop 1 will change when the state of flip flop O changes from 0 to 1 and state of flip flop 2 will change when the state of flip flop O changes from 1 to 0.
